title: Microsoft: BlackCat's Sphynx ransomware embeds Impacket, RemCom
description: Microsoft has discovered a new version of the BlackCat ransomware that embeds the Impacket networking framework and the Remcom hacking tool, both enabling spreading laterally across a breached network. [...]

title: Hackers ask $120,000 for access to multi-billion auction house
description: Hackers have breached the network of a major auction house and offered access to whoever was willing to pay $120,000. [...]

title: Microsoft PowerShell Gallery vulnerable to spoofing, supply chain attacks
description: Lax policies for package naming on Microsoft's PowerShell Gallery code repository allow threat actors to perform typosquatting attacks, spoof popular packages and potentially lay the ground for massive supply chain attacks. [...]

title: Phishing campaign steals accounts for Zimbra email servers worlwide
description: An ongoing phishing campaign has been underway since at least April 2023 that attempts to steal credentials for Zimbra Collaboration email servers worldwide. [...]

title: Windows Task Manager refresh can be paused using CTRL key
description: A very useful and previously unknown Windows tip was revealed this week, where you can halt process jumping in Task Manager by holding down the Ctrl key on your keyboard, allowing easier access to a listed process. [...]

title: Thousands of Android APKs use compression trick to thwart analysis
description: Threat actors increasingly distribute malicious Android APKs (packaged app installers) that resist decompilation using unsupported, unknown, or heavily tweaked compression algorithms. [...]

title: Triple Extortion Ransomware and the Cybercrime Supply Chain
description: Ransomware attacks continue to grow both in sophistication and quantity. Learn more from Flare about ransomware operation's increasing shift to triple extortion. [...]
